page.title: 14RECREATION CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: {IN SCHOOL:}We have a footbal league at lunch time. There are five teams. We each have four games to play. For each match you win you get two points and if you draw you get one point. We also play games such as hide and seek and chasing. We play a game which we call rounders which is similar to cricket but has four stumps. Mostly the girls play skipping and sevenses. In this game you throw a ball against a wall and catch it. At Gym we get long jump, throwing the cricket ball, high jump, shot putt, relay, 100m, and the 200m. {AT HOME:}When we are at home we play zarres. One person is 'it' and has to catch everyone else to make someone else it. At home many people play on bikes. Football, golf, tennis, bowls and badmington are popular games with local children. Some people play games on their computers and pocket toys.
